text:
BUOY HEALTH - A BOSTON-BASED, SERIES A HEALTH TECH COMPANY IS HIRING!

Buoy Health is an AI health assistant that aims to get patients away from googling their symptoms, and to the right care at the right time. We are looking for Full-Time, Onsite Software Engineers (senior, mid, junior, full-stack and back end) who specialize in React and Python.

An ideal candidate is someone who is passionate about making a difference in the world, loves the idea of solving complex problems that are ever changing, and thinks that having fun and working can go hand in hand.

Check us out at www.buoyhealth.com - take our symptom checker to experience how we're trying to transform healthcare - and then apply at https://www.buoyhealth.com/current/careers/

Any questions? email me directly at morgan@buoyhealth.com. Unfortunately at this time we are unable to do visa sponsorship.
